Emume Afrika Hertme bụ emume ụbọchị abụọ nke egwu Afrịka na-eme kwa afọ n'obodo Dutch nke Hertme
Ọ malitere na mberede na 1989, site na arụmọrụ nke otu egwu si Burkina Faso
Ọtụtụ puku mmadụ na-abịa ma enwere ọtụtụ ụlọ ahịa na-ere nri na ngwaahịa ndị dị iche iche

Emume ahụ mere emume ncheta afọ iri abụọ na ise ya n'afọ 2013, n'ihi mgbalị nke onye dọkịta na onye nhazi Rob Lokin. E nyere ya Silver Carnation na 2010 maka ọrụ a. Ihe dị ka ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo 400 na-akwado ya ma bụrụ nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ maka obodo nta nke ndị bi na 500

Tinyere isi ihe nkiri ahụ, e nwere ahịa Afrịka nwere ihe karịrị otu narị ebe, ndị na-enye nri na-atọ ụtọ nke Afrịka na mmemme ịgba egwu na egwu. N'afọ 2013, 2014 na 2015 magazin Songlines họpụtara Africa Festival otu n'ime emume iri abụọ na ise kachasị mma na Europe
N'afọ 2019, e nwere mmadụ 4,000 bịara. N'afọ 2020, a kagburu ya n'ihi ọrịa COVID-19 na Netherlands. N'afọ 2021, o mere n'ịntanetị.  Ọ laghachiri n'eziokwu na 2022.

Ndị na-ese ihe na-eme emume ahụ gụnyere:Àtụ:Col-begin
Àtụ:Col-break
